title: I CANT PLAY LEAGUE
body: I just redownloaded LoL because it was giving me problems and for some reason it won't open!!! PLZ HELP

replies.body: Try launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) from inside your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends). Let me know if this worked for you!
